title: Marketplace Algorithm Patents and Recommendation Engine Intelligence
domain: E-Commerce Marketplace Algorithm Patents, Recommendation Systems, and Competitive Intelligence

tertiary.naicsDescription: Other Scientific and Technical Consulting Services
tertiary.cpcDescription: Search customisation based on user profiles

keyPatents.title: Machine learning-based product recommendation system

independentClaims.claimText: A computer-implemented method for generating product recommendations, comprising: (a) collecting user interaction data including click-through rates, purchase history, session duration, and product view sequences; (b) applying collaborative filtering using matrix factorization with latent factors derived from user-item interaction matrices; (c) incorporating content-based filtering using product feature vectors including category, price, brand, and user-generated content sentiment; (d) combining collaborative and content-based recommendations using a weighted ensemble approach with dynamic weight adjustment based on data sparsity; (e) applying real-time personalization using contextual bandits to optimize recommendation relevance; and (f) presenting ranked product recommendations through a user interface with explanation mechanisms.

A system for marketplace recommendation generation comprising: (a) a data collection module configured to capture user behavioral signals across multiple touchpoints; (b) a machine learning engine implementing deep neural networks for feature extraction and pattern recognition; (c) a recommendation algorithm combining multiple filtering approaches with reinforcement learning optimization; (d) a real-time inference system capable of sub-100ms response times; and (e) an A/B testing framework for continuous algorithm improvement.

dependentClaims.claimText: The method of claim 1, wherein the matrix factorization uses singular value decomposition with regularization to prevent overfitting.
The method of claim 1, wherein the contextual bandits implementation uses Thompson sampling for exploration-exploitation balance.

violationTriggers.trigger: Implementation of collaborative filtering with matrix factorization
violationTriggers.description: Any system using user-item matrices with latent factor decomposition for recommendations

violationTriggers.trigger: Weighted ensemble of multiple recommendation algorithms
violationTriggers.description: Combining collaborative and content-based filtering with dynamic weighting
Using multi-armed bandit algorithms for recommendation optimization

keyPatents.riskAssessment: Very High - covers fundamental ML recommendation approaches with specific algorithmic implementations

workaroundStrategies.description: Use tensor decomposition or neural collaborative filtering instead of traditional matrix factorization
Implement business rule-based recommendations without machine learning
License recommendation technology from patent holders or use cloud services
